item.title: Access certificates in Azure
item.description: Thanks to this Stackoverflow post for the tip. After uploading the certificate using the Azure Portal, we need to add an appsetting called WEBSITE_LOAD_CERTIFICATES. The value of the setting is the thumbprint of the certificate. We can also pass multiple thumbprints, delimited by comma or use * to load all available certificates. After this the certificates will be loaded to the web application personal certificate store. The certificate can then be accessed by code
